text: *** Bug 11015 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

If I understand the ls-example on the CLI site right, the -option should be a 
abbreviation for the --option:
  -a    -all
  -A    -allmost-all
  -b    -escape

Ant provides abbreviations for the most used options. (Only options without 
arguments. For these options - e.g. logger - you have to write so much that 
these few characters don´t disturb.)

So please provide an explanation for that need.
